channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Simply Excerpts
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Simply Excerpts

item.title: CVE-2023-5137|2024-08-02T07:52:06.696Z -- unknown -- simply%20excerpts
item.description: The Simply Excerpts WordPress plugin through 1.4 does not sanitize and escape some fields in the plugin settings, which could allow high-privilege users such as an administrator to inject arbitrary web scripts even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in a multisite setup).
